articles.title: 'We're ready' — American Electric Power CEO says it's focused on cybersecurity defense for years - CNBC
articles.description: "This industry has been obviously working with our government partners for a long time now, and we're ready," AEP CEO Nick Akins told CNBC.
articles.content:
American Electric Power CEO Nick Akins told CNBC's Jim Cramer on Thursday that the utility provider feels confident in its cybersecurity defenses.

articles.title: Biden hits Russia with new sanctions, says Putin 'chose' war - CP24 Toronto's Breaking News
articles.description: President Joe Biden hit back Thursday against Russia's invasion of Ukraine, unleashing robust new sanctions, ordering the deployment of thousands of additional troops to NATO ally Germany and declaring that America would stand up to Russia's Vladimir Putin.

articles.title: Dunkin' Donuts temporarily closes all 19 outlets due to 'operational issue' - TODAY
articles.description: SINGAPORE — American doughnut and coffee chain Dunkin’ Donuts will be temporarily closing all its stores across the island from Wednesday (Feb 23) due to an “operational issue”.
articles.content:
